experience.title: Actuarial Analyst
responsibilities: Develop and maintain pricing models for personal lines of business using Generalized Linear Models (GLMs).
Collaborate with the Product Management team to implement rate changes and monitor impact on retention and loss ratios.
Perform quarterly reserve reviews to ensure adequate funding for future claims across multiple casualty lines.
Automate recurring reporting processes using SQL and Python, reducing manual data entry time by 30%.

experience.title: Actuarial Intern
responsibilities: Assisted senior consultants in the valuation of defined benefit pension plans for corporate clients.
Performed experience studies to update mortality and turnover assumptions based on client-specific historical data.
Utilized Excel VBA to enhance the efficiency of internal valuation software tools.
Conducted peer reviews of technical documentation to ensure compliance with Actuarial Standards of Practice (ASOPs).

metadata.experience_level: Prior internship/job experience(s) in the job field.
